header.p: South Park is by far my favorite show on television. It is brilliantly hilarious and ruthlessly absurd. I know a great deal about the show, about as much as or more than anyone else. Recently I decided it was time to put my knowledge and appreciation of the show to good use.

Please note that reviewing every episode of South Park is a mammoth task. I have 15+ seasons of episodes to review, and it will take a while. Below are the seasons for which I have reviewed episodes so far.
